{"doc":{"info":{"calaisRequestID":"a38cfef7-043a-5c72-146f-229d35c4ae6a","id":"http://id.opencalais.com/1LqPsyT2HXAaZ6-2qXbe8w","docId":"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/8c64337f-e4b6-30d3-843a-e9f78fe2d8fb","document":" ￼Lucy I nursed you as a father would from babyhood, Lucy, till now, dreaming of how soon, when you'd grown an inch or two I'd claim my due and plunge into your freshly ripened treasure. But I've been beaten to the claim; you're on the game, admitting men time and again \u2014 seven years old when first you tried: you opened wide, it slipped inside, that new toy for your pleasure. I'd made myself a rule, I well remember, for my tool, nobly forcing it to wait outside in the vestibule, not to crash your virgin gate. But you, little delinq  uent, you've invited men to sink huger, more delicious thrusts into that receptive chink, not too small for adult lusts. 'Virginity till puberty': I was a fool to make that rule. Lucy, Lucy, precocious child, you got the itch to try games women play with men. It makes me cry, it makes me cry, truly makes me cry. 41 \n￼[Te futuram iam maturam dum studeo, custidio. Lice/ Lice/ corpus adhuc impube, tenerum, furtim vendis, migrans, adulterum doleo! doleo! doleo!] 42 \n￼With all my care to be quite fair and let you grow, I was too slow; Lucy, Lucy, my randy nymphet with the roving eye, you sell your little body on the sly. It makes me cry, truly makes me cry. \\ 43 ","docTitle":"","docDate":"2014-07-01 08:42:46.242"},"meta":{"contentType":"text/raw","emVer":"7.1.1103.5","langIdVer":"DefaultLangId","processingVer":"CalaisJob01","submissionDate":"2014-07-01 08:42:45.852","submitterCode":"57b17a53-6e34-87b0-20ff-a419896f49c9","signature":"digestalg-1|HzNKz+hiiTYWQTciOaibfKHwIV0=|c/ZUT3vRtbvSLRBsKjhgVyM1Mf2BmX0KinvYEP4Y7Pv6h/ZiC7c+Uw==","language":"English"}},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/8c64337f-e4b6-30d3-843a-e9f78fe2d8fb/lid/DefaultLangId":{"_typeGroup":"language","language":"http://d.opencalais.com/lid/DefaultLangId/English"},"http://d.opencalais.com/pershash-1/74fc7f83-d006-3669-9f41-09c2ed69f0ca":{"_typeGroup":"entities","_type":"Person","name":"Lucy","persontype":"N/A","nationality":"N/A","commonname":"Lucy","_typeReference":"http://s.opencalais.com/1/type/em/e/Person","instances":[{"detection":"[puberty': I was a fool to make that rule.
